title: Contact Us
description: We are here to help you! Whether you have questions about our app, need support with any issues you're facing, or want to know more about upcoming events, our team is ready to assist you.
contact_info: Feel free to reach out to us via email, phone, or by filling out the form to let us know how we can help you.

form.heading: Contact Us
form.subheading: You can reach us at any time
form.name: Full Name
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

validation.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
